SEARCH
Package Game.Interfaces

Interface Entity

All Known Implementing Classes:
Enemy, Player
public interface Entity
The Entity interface defines the common properties and behaviors for entities in the game, such as players or other interactable objects.
Author:
Tânia Morais, Tomás Neto

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Gets the name of the entity.
      Returns:
      the name of the entity

    • getDivision

      Division getDivision()
      Gets the division where the entity is currently located.
      Returns:
      the current division of the entity

    • setDivision

      void setDivision(Division division)
      Sets the division for the entity.
      Parameters:
      division - the new division for the entity

    • setName

      void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the entity.
      Parameters:
      name - the new name of the entity

    • getPower

      int getPower()
      Gets the power level of the entity.
      Returns:
      the power of the entity

    • setPower

      void setPower(int power)
      Sets the power level of the entity.
      Parameters:
      power - the new power of the entity

    • getHealth

      int getHealth()
      Gets the health of the entity.
      Returns:
      the health of the entity

    • setHealth

      void setHealth(int health)
      Sets the health of the entity.
      Parameters:
      health - the new health of the entity

    • calculateHealth

      int calculateHealth(int OpositePower) throws InvalidElementException
      Calculates the remaining health of the entity after taking damage based on the opposing entity's power.
      Parameters:
      OpositePower - the attack power of the opposing entity
      Returns:
      the remaining health of the entity
      Throws:
      InvalidElementException - if the opposing power is invalid

    • isAlive

      boolean isAlive()
      Checks if the entity is still alive based on its health.
      Returns:
      true if the entity's health is greater than zero, false otherwise

    • takeDamage

      void takeDamage(int damage)
      Applies damage to the entity by reducing its health.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to be applied
